name: POLARIS
sampleDescriptions: Prepare recommendations for executive branch action (mostly DOL and DHS, but also Department of State) related to the H-2A and H-2B guestworker programs to allow workers to leave abusive employers, to

Recommend specific regulatory or other policy changes the Department of Labor has authority to implement regarding worker mobility in the H-2 visa programs, as well as ways to combat recruitment abuse
